name: Shazam
description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com

api_methods.name: songs/get-count
api_methods.description: Get total times the specific song is detected/shazamed by using .../songs/detect or .../songs/v2/detect endpoint

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

utterances.utterance: How many times has 'Blinding Lights' by The Weeknd been identified by users?
Tell me the total number of Shazams for 'Shape of You' by Ed Sheeran.
I want to know how popular 'Levitating' by Dua Lipa is—can you check how many times it's been detected?
Find out the detection count for 'Bad Guy' by Billie Eilish.
Could you show me how many people have used Shazam to identify 'Old Town Road' by Lil Nas X?
Let me know the total Shazam count for 'Dance Monkey' by Tones and I.
Check the number of times 'Stay' by The Kid LAROI and Justin Bieber has been recognized.
How often has 'Sunflower' by Post Malone and Swae Lee been detected?
Give me the total detection number for 'Happier' by Marshmello and Bastille.
Can you tell me how many Shazams 'Someone You Loved' by Lewis Capaldi has received?
